text: Jonah and the Pink Whale is a 1995 Bolivian Mexican comedy movie directed by Juan Carlos Valdivia and based on the 1987 novel by José Wolfango Montes Vannuci. It stars Dino García, María Renée Prudencio, Julieta Egurrola. ==Other websites== * Category:1995 comedy movies Category:Bolivian movies Category:Mexican comedy movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Jonah and the Pink Whale
